title: Game Progress Route
content:
7) in front of Brine Pools. She speaks out loud that there are no more tadpoles and that it is an indicator that they are planning something big. She had been captured by the Illithids and you have gained an opportunity to free Wyll from his pact with her.

[INTIMIDATION] Free Wyll, or I let the cult infect you. I bet you'd make a loyal thrall. [HISTORY] Remember all you can about devils and their contracts. [PERFORMANCE] Say you know a pact-breaking charm and chant a series of pseudo-Infernal p
